channel.title: Clients. How do I open em?
channel.description:
So I just downloaded this really cool client and i really wanna play it so I open it up and I find all these class file and a few MS-DOS files. Heres a picture [URL=http://img147.imageshack.us/my.php?image=closedclientlt6.png][IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/5931/closedclientlt6.th.png[/img][/URL] So what i want to know is how do i open this client and use it? :confused:
Please don't yell at me if i posted in wrong section. i didn't know where to post this.

item.title: Clients. How do I open em?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

oh… do you get this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue . . .

if so then add this:

java -cp . client

Read full topic
item.source: Clients. How do I open em?

item.title: Clients. How do I open em?
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

[quote=“tobias222, post:12, topic:163914”]replace the run.bat with:

java -cp . EGUI

no because he doesn’t have the egui class, just use client

… Hope it works :)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Clients. How do I open em?

item.title: Clients. How do I open em?
item.dc:creator: @skatebaker37 skatebaker37
item.description:
@skatebaker37 wrote:

[quote=“Ben Sprinkle, post:8, topic:163914”][quote author=skatebaker37 link=topic=222635.msg1924181#msg1924181 date=1197335939]

runeserver.bat or voule.bat server will load then sign in with a client…

I dont have a voule so when i runserver.bat this is what i get

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]
lol my old endar gui rofls…
make a new .bat file with this in it:

@java -Xmx500m client [/quote]
when i do that i just closes like half a second after opened.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2007, 03:05:24 PM[/size][hr]i don’t know if this plays a role or anything but this is a closed client things. I don’t know what that means or if it plays a role in this problem

Read full topic

item.title: Clients. How do I open em?
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

[quote=“skatebaker37, post:3, topic:163914”][quote author=killyalater link=topic=222635.msg1924174#msg1924174 date=1197335720]
runeserver.bat or voule.bat server will load then sign in with a client…
[/quote]
I dont have a voule so when i runserver.bat this is what i get

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
lol my old endar gui rofls…
make a new .bat file with this in it:

@java -Xmx500m client

like, you got the client in the server file you wanna play in…so change the client in your server map, to the client you say is so “cool”, so simple “trade” them from places.
